title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
description: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, an error is shown when trying to create a new table group. The expected behavior is that the group dialog should be shown, allowing the user to define a group even if the dataset is not defined.
OB: When trying to create a new table group without setting the dataset, an error is shown.
EB: When trying to create a new table group without setting the dataset, the group dialog should be shown. The user should be able to go and define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Try to create a new table group.
3. The group dialog should be shown, allowing the user to define a group even if the dataset is not defined.
